page.title: 09MOVEMENT OF PEOPLE IN B.N.
page.content:
************************************** We went round Buckland Newton to find how many people have moved into the area. It proved to be a very interesting survey. We found out 17 people out of 21 have moved into Buckland Newton.4 out of the 17 have lived elsewhere in Dorset however the main place where people moved from is London. 3 out of 17 have lived in a different country before moving to Buckland Newton. We found out lots of people moved into B.N. because they had retired. 2 out of 21 are thinking of moving out of the area.
This information leads us to reflect that the population is increasing but it is becoming more of a retirement area.
